scripts._ci-env-warn: echo !!!This script is supposed to executed in github actions only. Ignore if you are seeing this message in a github actions log.
scripts.releaseSrc: npm run _make_src-node && npm run _createSrcReleaseConfig && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/tauri-local.conf.json
scripts.releaseSrcDebug: npm run _make_src-node && npm run _createSrcReleaseConfig && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/tauri-local.conf.json --debug --verbose
scripts.releaseDist: npm run _make_src-node && npm run _createDistReleaseConfig && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/tauri-local.conf.json
scripts.releaseDistBundle: npm run _make_src-node && npm run _createDistBundleReleaseConfig && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/tauri-local.conf.json --verbose
scripts.releaseDistDebug: npm run _make_src-node && npm run _createDistReleaseConfig && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/tauri-local.conf.json --debug --verbose
scripts.releaseDistTest: npm run _make_src-node && npm run _createDistTestReleaseConfig && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/tauri-local.conf.json
scripts.releaseDistTestDebug: npm run _make_src-node && npm run _createDistTestReleaseConfig && tauri build --config ./src-tauri/tauri-local.conf.json --debug
scripts._ci-cloneAndBuildPhoenix: npm run _ci-env-warn && node ./src-build/clonePhoenix.js && cd phoenix && npm ci && npm run build && cd ..
scripts._ci-release:dev: npm run _ci-env-warn && npm run _ci-cloneAndBuildPhoenix && cd phoenix && npm run release:dev && cd .. && npm run _ci-createDistReleaseConfig && npm run _ci_make_src-node
scripts._ci-release:staging: npm run _ci-env-warn && npm run _ci-cloneAndBuildPhoenix && cd phoenix && npm run release:staging && cd .. && npm run _ci-createDistReleaseConfig && npm run _ci_make_src-node
scripts._ci-release:prod: npm run _ci-env-warn && npm run _ci-cloneAndBuildPhoenix && cd phoenix && npm run release:prod && cd .. && npm run _ci-createDistReleaseConfig && npm run _ci_make_src-node
